attributes.action: Get the police and their speed cameras off the motorways / dual carriageways and into town
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The last 6 times I've seen any police man has included 5 hiding on slip roads of my nearest dual carriageway (the other once was on halloween handing out sweets to kids).
My son has to cross a 30mph road to school with 300 other children - and the council have measured people doing 70mph on that road at school opening and closing times.
The road has been the scene of 5 accidents in the last year - involving 10 vehicles, a garden wall, a garden fence, road signs, several injuries and 8 written off cars.
All of these accidents could but for pure luck have killed several dozen school children. 
The police though are on the dual carriageway so the carnage and devastation in the town carries on without intervention.
This is the same up and down the country.
Approx 1/3 of all deaths are in 30mph zones, almost all children killed on the roads are killed in 30mph zones.
